title: Integrated metabolomics and network pharmacology reveal the PI3K/Akt-mediated therapeutic mechanism of Abrus cantoniensis in lipid metabolism disorders.
abstract: Abrus cantoniensis (AC), a hepatoprotective herb, shows therapeutic potential for lipid metabolism disorders (LMDs), yet its mechanisms remain unclear.
journal: Phytomedicine : international journal of phytotherapy and phytopharmacology
